Good progress on Chinese wine, lobster trade barriers, says Australia trade ministerChina will complete a review into years-long tariffs on Australian wine by the end of March and is also reviewing its restrictions on lobster imports, Australian Trade Minister Don Farrell said on Sunday. Sun, 10 Mar 2024 00:19:32 GMT NN6Y7ORWBVLCFPBI7ZMMIXFQXU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/good-progress-chinese-wine-lobster-trade-barriers-says-australia-trade-minister-2024-03-10/Lewis Jackson世界亚太地区
China's lithium market set for long-term uptrend, says Ganfeng LithiumChina's lithium industry would benefit from a stabilisation of prices of the battery metal, which is set for a long-term uptrend, said the chairman of Ganfeng Lithium, a major Chinese supplier of the battery metal. Sat, 09 Mar 2024 08:07:58 GMT N26XHXDT3ZIMLD42EIOOB4AYGU https://www.reuters.com/markets/commodities/chinas-lithium-market-set-long-term-uptrend-says-ganfeng-lithium-2024-03-09/Siyi Liu, Colleen Howe市场商品
China warns overall pressure on employment yet to easeChina still faces structural employment issues and overall pressure on jobs has not eased, the human resources minister said on Saturday, as the slowing economy braces for another record number of college graduates in 2024. Sat, 09 Mar 2024 08:05:26 GMT U5F3JCVMZ5OUJIJ63WG6B6DRSY https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-says-overall-employment-Pressure-yet-ease-2024-03-09/Ellen Zhang, Liangping Gao, Ryan Woo商业工作世界
US mulls blacklisting CXMT to curb China's chip advance, Bloomberg News saysThe United States is weighing sanctions on several Chinese tech companies, including chipmaker ChangXin Memory Technologies, in a bid to further restrain China's development of advanced semiconductors, Bloomberg News said on Friday. Sat, 09 Mar 2024 02:55:56 GMT UBIV5LSIANPZ5GYE2FLOUVKTLE https://www.reuters.com/technology/us-mulls-blacklisting-cxmt-curb-chinas-chip-advance-bloomberg-news-says-2024-03-09/Reuters技术
China's consumer prices swing up on seasonal Lunar New Year gainsChina's consumer prices rose for the first time in six months due to spending linked to the Lunar New Year, offering some reprieve for the world's second-biggest economy grappling with weak consumer sentiment, while factory-gate prices fell again. Sat, 09 Mar 2024 01:47:46 GMT 3B32KLSQQBP3LDHB3HQQCUGKDI https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-feb-consumer-prices-rise-07-year-earlier-2024-03-09/Ryan Woo, Liangping Gao市场宏观问题
As UN urges Sudan truce, Russia and China cite GazaThe United Nations Security Council on Friday called for an immediate cessation of hostilities in Sudan, prompting China to remind it not to forget about the Israel-Hamas war in Gaza and Russia to accuse the United States of double standards. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 22:15:40 GMT B7X3MIXOMBND7PMFF7C5PSNWTI https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/un-urgent-sudan-truce-Russia-china-cite-gaza-2024-03-08/Michelle Nichols世界非洲
